Tata Ace Gold 2250/CNG Overview

The Tata Ace Gold 2250/CNG has a 694 cc engine which is powered by CNG, with a fuel tank capacity of 70 (12 kg) liters, GBS 65-5/5.6 gearbox & compliant with BS-VI emission norms. The WheelBase & GVW of 2250/CNG are 2250 mm & 1630 kg respectively. It also has various features like Mechanical Steering, D+1, Disc/Drum brakes & more.
